name: Gênese
summary: An interactive experience of creating entire stellar systems, planets and civilizations, playing as the supreme God of this Universe. Build colossal worlds from molecules. Evolve advanced civilizations from simple bacteria. Experience an amazing, rich and detailed gameplay, writing your own story.

name: Gênio Quiz
summary: Gênio Quiz is a free browser trivia game with 50 questions that challenges your brain, developed by André Birnfeld and released on his defunct website, lol.net.br.

name: Gênio Quiz Luccas Neto
summary: Gênio Quiz Luccas Neto is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Luccas Neto, with 50 questions themed around the YouTuber.

name: Gênio Box
summary: Gênio Box is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where you must select hints to find out what object is inside the box.

name: Gênio Quiz BBB 21
summary: Gênio Quiz BBB 21 is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the 2021 edition of Big Brother Brasil.

name: Gênio Quiz 5
summary: Gênio Quiz 3 is the fifth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz Anitta
summary: Gênio Quiz Anitta is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Anitta, with 50 questions themed around the Brazilian singer.

name: Gênio Quiz Felipe Neto
summary: Gênio Quiz Felipe Neto is a spin-off of Genius Quiz themed around Felipe Neto, with 50 questions themed around the YouTuber.

name: Gênio Fly
summary: Gênio Fly is a spin-off from Genius Quiz with the style of the bird game that became very famous, but easier.

name: Gênio Quiz Eleições
summary: Gênio Quiz Eleições is a themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the 2018 Brazilian Elections.

name: Gênio Quiz 3
summary: Gênio Quiz 3 is the third entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz 2
summary: Gênio Quiz 2 is a sequel to Gênio Quiz with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz 4
summary: Gênio Quiz 3 is the fourth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gênio Quiz Poke 2
summary: Gênio Quiz Poke 2 is a sequel to Genius Quiz Poke, with 50 new questions themed around the Pokémon franchise.
